javadoc:
Generates a text label that lists the function tags for each {@link Function}. The
  label will will appear as part of the FUNCTION group in the field map.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: model
params.comment: the model that the field belongs to.

params.name: fieldOptions
params.comment: the Options for field specific properties.

methods.javadoc: Overridden to ensure that we return` a {@link FunctionTagFieldLocation} instance.
methods.name: getProgramLocation
methods.comment: Overridden to ensure that we return` a FunctionTagFieldLocation instance.

methods.javadoc:
Overridden to ensure that we only place function tag text on the header of a 
 function.
methods.name: getFieldLocation
methods.comment:
Overridden to ensure that we only place function tag text on the header of a 
 function.

methods.name: createFunctionTagElements
methods.comment:
Creates a tags list field to be show at the beginning of each function that shows the tags
 assigned to that function.

params.name: function
params.comment: the function to retrieve the tags from

methods.name: getTags
methods.comment: Returns all function tags associated with the given function.

params.name: function
params.comment: the function to retrieve the tags from

name: FunctionTagFieldFactory
comment:
Generates a text label that lists the function tags for each Function. The
  label will will appear as part of the FUNCTION group in the field map.
